com.github.kaiwinter.androidremotenotifications.persistence

Interface NotificationStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SharedPreferencesStore

    public interface NotificationStore
    Interface for persisting notifications and configurations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearPersistentNotifications()
      Removes all notifications from the store.
      java.util.Date getLastServerUpdate()
      Loads the date when the notifications was updated from the server the last time.
      java.util.Set<PersistentNotification> getPersistentNotifications()
      Loads all saved PersistentNotifications.
      void replacePersistentNotifications(java.util.Set<PersistentNotification> persistentNotifications)
      Replaces the currently stored PersistentNotifications by the passed ones.
      void saveLastServerUpdate(java.util.Date date)
      Saves the date when the notifications was updated from the server the last time.
      void updatePersistentNotification(java.util.Set<PersistentNotification> updatePersistentNotifications)
      Updates the PersistentNotification in the NotificationStore with the given updatePersistentNotifications.

    • Method Detail

      • getLastServerUpdate

        java.util.Date getLastServerUpdate()
        Loads the date when the notifications was updated from the server the last time.
        Returns:
        The last update date.

      • saveLastServerUpdate

        void saveLastServerUpdate(java.util.Date date)
        Saves the date when the notifications was updated from the server the last time.
        Parameters:
        date - The last update date.

      • getPersistentNotifications

        java.util.Set<PersistentNotification> getPersistentNotifications()
        Loads all saved PersistentNotifications.
        Returns:
        The saved PersistentNotifications

      • updatePersistentNotification

        void updatePersistentNotification(java.util.Set<PersistentNotification> updatePersistentNotifications)
        Updates the PersistentNotification in the NotificationStore with the given updatePersistentNotifications. The notifications to update are identified by their hashCode/equals methods.
        Parameters:
        updatePersistentNotifications - The PersistentNotification to update.

      • replacePersistentNotifications

        void replacePersistentNotifications(java.util.Set<PersistentNotification> persistentNotifications)
        Replaces the currently stored PersistentNotifications by the passed ones.
        Parameters:
        persistentNotifications - The PersistentNotifications to store.

      • clearPersistentNotifications

        void clearPersistentNotifications()
        Removes all notifications from the store.
